name: Born from the Earth
text: Can be used if you control a "Dark Magician" and your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Place 1 "Metamorphortress" face-down on your side of the field. If your opponent controls a Dragon-Type monster with 3000 ATK or more, you can use this Skill regardless of your Life Points. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
